results.content:
I Di not enjoy this course and surprised by the rating he has?
He does not explain the code merely types and you follow along with parrot fashion. This way you really do not learn much and at times find it hard to match his speed. Not much fun pausing video every few seconds. Some of his code is his preferences that you won't find anywhere and therefore a bit confusing.

You get the feeling he can't be bothered and would rather get this over with not very engaging at all.

Also, he stores his queries on sperate pages which is not really practical as you will be writing many different ones in a normal CRUD website.
